title: Luxury villa for sale in Nawala
details:
Looking for an Investment!!! Here's the Opportunity !!!

This property is located in a superb neighborhood and easy access to Colombo 5, Nugegoda and Rajagiriya,

Further details:
Land extent : 24.75 perch

- Master bedroom with en-suite dressing room and washroom. Includes a Jacuzzi.
- 4 other large bedrooms. All come with attached washrooms.
-Office room with visitor's washroom.
- Maid's room with washroom and driver's room with a separate washroom.

All rooms have air cons
30'x15' pool with Jacuzzi and a landscaped garden.
Parking for more than 2-3 vehicles +
